metadata.title: CVE-2017-0524 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high
metadata.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Synaptics touchscreen drivercould enable a local malicious application to execute arbitrary code withinthe context of the kernel. This issue is rated as High because it firstrequires compromising a privileged process. Product: Android. Versions:Kernel-3.10, Kernel-3.18. Android ID: A-33002026.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
